issue.title: [Dev][Archery][Crossbow] Comment bot doesn't report suitable task URLs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18048](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18048). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If we generate a report immediately after we submit CI tasks, the generated report doesn't have suitable task CI task URL. Because CI tasks aren't started. We need to wait for a while before we generate a report to collect suitable CI task URLs.
